data.name: TitTok 3
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1764810/


About the Game

TitTok 3 - Minimalistic adventure 2D puzzle platformer with cats, explosions and spinning saws! Continuation of the TitTok 2.


Continuation of the legendary TitTok game: Bigger, Cooler, More Epic! The player's goal is to complete all levels and not die from the attacks of evil enemies and traps!
You can find bombs on levels and plant them ANYWHERE, even in the air!

▪ Kitties ^. ^
▪ Atmospheric soundtrack by Sun Candles
▪ Three levels of Difficulty
▪ Story: 40 levels
▪ Puzzles: 10 levels
▪ Unlimited number of Bombs and Massive explosions
▪ Double jumps
▪ Lasers, Cannons
▪ Moving platforms, Portals
▪ Beautiful effects
▪ A cool Plot, a direct continuation of the first part
▪ A variety of enemies, Mini-Bosses and a cool Super Boss
▪ Large, long and beautiful levels
▪ And much more..

..And in the game you can MEOW at any time ^^
TitTok 3 - Bigger, Cooler, More Epic!
TikTok? No! TitTok! TikTok ≠ TitTok
And remember: "Tit before your Tok!"

data.short_description: TitTok 3 - Minimalistic adventure 2D puzzle platformer with cats, explosions and spinning saws! Continuation of the TitTok 2.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 10
  • Processor: Intel 1,5 Ghz or AMD analogue
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or NVIDIA/AMD analogue
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
